title: New: Kitty Pryde – R.R.E.A.M.
content:
Kitty Pryde just keeps getting better.

I wish that instead of writing about this track I could just post all the lyrics. With immaculate production from the ever awesome GRANT, R.R.E.A.M. (a hat-tip to WU TANG’s C.R.E.A.M.) contains the now expected level of self-depreciation and cutesy wit from Kitty. In such a male dominant genre, it’s refreshing to hear a white, female rhyming with such ease and apparent confidence. Check out R.R.E.A.M. (Rash Rules Everything Around Me) below. (Premiered via Noisey)
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
